Reviews.Title: “really nice value for money hotel”
Reviews.Author: traveling_uc
Reviews.Content: excited visit paris time city didnt disappoint neither hotel location louvre tulleries rue de rivoli shopping museums little champs pleasant walks hotel basic tiny nice happily surprised bathroom shared own sink shower guy reception map explained spoke spanish english helped lot basic french notsonice breakfast included costed 11 euros little expensive buffet style bread fruits coffee

Reviews.Title: “Excellent city centre hotel”
Reviews.Author: EnglishRose25
Reviews.Content: family run hotel ideally situated paris nearby metro easy walking distance louvre lots restaurants shops lovely quiet hotel helpful staff standard cleanliness showers baths lift choice business holiday definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: fichu1800
Reviews.Content: stayed nights recently twin hotel staff extremely helpful friendly hotel spacious clean tidy hotel situated walking distance main attractions louvre opera garnier department stores forth time staying period five recent refurbishment transformed hotel highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “great little Paris hotel !”
Reviews.Author: RosaleenK
Reviews.Content: family 2 adults 2 kids returned 2 night stay hotel hotel wonderful little hotel fantastic warm housekeeping staff friendly helpful stayed 7 ago loved disappointed time location exploring paris close shopping street restaurants metro stop stones throw stayed paris hotels rating comparision definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Mixed Thoughts”
Reviews.Author: Danaheartsvacations
Reviews.Content: start saying love hotel perfect location quiet street near restaurants shops super clean extremely affordable 5 stars customer service wonderful staff nice answered questions restaurant recommendations liked breakfast included cheap unfortunately dislikes likes 1 star based previous reviews garden view street noise super quiet view basically alleyway fortunately 2 huge windows kept entire week mind hotel doesnt air conditioning super hot issue bed incredibly hard probably hardest bed ive slept didnt normal pillows instead soft roll shaped pillow 6 inches thick pillows sent grab wasnt empty stole pillows fortunately found fan borrowed found blanket closet sleeping extra padding tiny expected europe tiny wasnt dresser shelves tiny closet bathroom pretty size compared shower shower head diagonally doors water spray shower onto bathroom floor bidet bathroom rid bidet dresser larger shower bars soap size thumb 4 extras instead replaced wout finally towels thin rough cant imagine replaced love hotel potential definitely updates

Reviews.Title: “Great price and great location”
Reviews.Author: Heather_0183
Reviews.Content: stayed nights paris experience staff helpful pleasant hotel centrally located brief walk subway stop price location balcony neat view city street below little noisy night trying sleep private shower shared toilet ran issues wait clean absolutely stay

Reviews.Title: “If you are an ardent stamp or coin collector, this hotel is for you”
Reviews.Author: DanB001
Reviews.Content: absolutely perfect location stamp coin shops located location superb block famous rue metro grands street hotel quiet quant excellent value front staff friendly hotel free internet clean comfortable definitely stay trip paris october

Reviews.Title: “Great location - and good value if you are on a tight budget”
Reviews.Author: Lara_Mattia
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights october hotel central location – perfect sightseeing close metro late night lots people nearby bistrots pubs discos safe girls 6th floor lovely balcony tiny ensuite bathroom bathroom comfortable warm clean despite top floor faced street bit noisy – wouldn’t roomsfloors didn’t ceiling bathroom literally falling pieces bit scary nice rubble floor day walls thin hear bathroom heard corridor breakfast definitely expensive it’s boulangeries nearby there’s starbucks opposite street can’t muffin staff helpful spoke italian leave luggage reception day checkout time airport conclusion – tight budget – expect frills

Reviews.Title: “Love it!”
Reviews.Author: paintingsecrets
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel 3 times stay june 2010 weeks am happy hotel international guests stay french actually stay thats sign staff warm welcoming friendly helpful witty appreciate considerate staff policy leave key front desk anytime outside hotel youre thats clean youll housekeeping knocking door youre ready sleep worries stay single toilet corridor comfortable sounds ive impression wasnt sharing people shower basin single kept sparkling clean theres heaps hot water single ive stayed hotel ive aware road noise bars cafes close times ive stayed hotel ive kept awake noise im light sleeper recommend ear plugs beds comfortable single youre rewarded gorgeous view paris roof tops cant believe location hotel beaten walk youre pressed time metro rer pick drop bus stops block meals easy breakfast brought dining doors buy lightest croissants 1 euro surrounding cafes meals brasseries fixed price menus cafes chinesethai restaurant round corner pasta dare mcdonalds self cater monoprix corner ive double bathrooms modestly charming youll couple french windows floor includes balcony theyre roomy comfortable youre budget hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable hotel. Bad employees.”
Reviews.Author: alexdoidge
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel times close office apart cant attitude front desk found comfortable spacious arrived evening sold due hadnt confirmed night desk reception actually laughed told hotels hence recomend resort

Reviews.Title: “Good value for a great location”
Reviews.Author: sweetiemon
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel week cheapest location quality staff friendly speaks english hotel wonderful bed confortable bathroom clean week day noisy outside street definitely recommend
